weekly_top_story.headline: FDA Approves Updated COVID-19 Vaccines for Fall 2025, Restricts Eligibility to High-Risk Groups
weekly_top_story.summary: The FDA approved Moderna's updated COVID-19 vaccines targeting the LP.8.1 variant for fall 2025, limiting use to adults aged 65 and older or those with at least one high-risk medical condition, marking a significant shift in vaccination policy.

stories.headline: FDA Approves Moderna's Updated COVID-19 Vaccines Targeting LP.8.1 Variant for Fall 2025
stories.summary: The FDA approved updated fall 2025 COVID-19 vaccines only for adults 65 years and older and individuals with at least one high-risk medical condition, which may influence vaccine accessibility and insurance coverage.

stories.headline: Cleveland Clinic Martin Health Emergency Departments Recognized for Excellence by Emergency Nurses Association
stories.summary: Cleveland Clinic Martin Health's Emergency Departments have been acknowledged for excellence by the Emergency Nurses Association, highlighting high standards in emergency care and nursing practice.
